comments.body:
I don't remember if we have discussed this high requirements previously.
Is this really a required version? (this is top notch version)
Yeah, this is worth re-thinking unless you're using a 4.2 only feature üëçüèª

@peterblazejewicz @orta  This is because this package depends on `@ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils` and `utils` depends on 4.2 because of `ResizeObserverEntry`.

https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/52322#discussion_r611264797
